name: Squat Jumps
how_to_perform:
1. Start in a standing position, with your feet shoulder-width apart and your hands by your sides.
2. Lower yourself into a squat, keeping your back straight and your core engaged. Keep your weight evenly distributed between both feet.

3. From the lowest point of the squat, explosively jump up from the ground, extending your legs fully. Your arms should remain in a bent position, with your elbows close to your body.
4. As you jump, keep your posture upright and your balance stable.

5. Briefly touch down on the balls of your feet before immediately jumping again.
6. Repeat this process for the desired number of repetitions, keeping your landing quiet and in control throughout the exercise.
short_summary: Squat jumps are an explosive lower body exercise that works multiple muscle groups and can be performed without any equipment
